actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to eliminate the existing exemption for labor, agricultural, and horticultural organizations.

summary.text: Provides, under the Bank Holding Company Act, that the exemption from the prohibition of the Act against holding interests in nonbanking organizations shall no longer be afforded to any holding company which is a labor, agricultural, or horticultural organization. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 1843(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to eliminate the existing exemption for labor, agricultural, and horticultural organizations.
